title: Everglades National Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Anhinga Trail Closures update  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Anhinga Trail Closures update  On June 13 remaining portions of the Anhinga Boardwalk were closed. Visitors can access the asphalt trail along the canal just up to the first intersection.          Update: Shark Valley potable water  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Update: Shark Valley potable water   The water issue at Shark Valley has been resolved. It is safe to drink so fill up your water bottles and stay hydrated.
